FdoINetworkWithinCostCommand
SetCost
SetStartNetworkFeature

virtual FDO_API void FdoINetworkWithinCostCommand::SetCost (  double  cost  )  [pure virtual]
 

This method is used to set the cost value. This value will be used to limit the network analysis to a given cost.

Parameters:
cost The maximum cost value used by the analysis command.
Returns:
Returns nothing
